Passport.title: PET HEALTH PASSPORT
Passport.name: NAME
Passport.footer_text: Automatically generated on careyour.pet. Not an official legal document without a vet clinic stamp.

AboutProject.archive_desc: Forget about lost certificates. Store tests, vaccinations, and prescriptions in the cloud.
AboutProject.passport_desc: Generate a full pet health report in one click. Perfect for traveling.
AboutProject.security_desc: You decide who gets access to your pet's data: the vet, a relative, or a pet sitter.

ForVeterinarians.title: Are you a Veterinarian?
ForVeterinarians.description: Join the platform, verify your qualification, and get convenient tools for patient management. Forget about paperwork.

Footer.title: careyour.pet
Footer.description: A modern platform for caring for the health of your pets.

BeVet.verdesc: To access veterinary features, we need to verify your qualifications.
BeVet.photo: A photo or scan of your veterinary diploma. The name in your profile must match the name on the document.
BeVet.ver2: We are reviewing your documents. This usually takes up to 24 hours. You will receive a notification regarding the decision.
BeVet.gtfo2: Unfortunately, we could not verify your status.

Login.verdesc: To access veterinary features, we need to verify your qualifications.
Login.photo: A photo or scan of your veterinary diploma. The name in your profile must match the name on the document.
Login.ver2: We are reviewing your documents. This usually takes up to 24 hours. You will receive a notification regarding the decision.
Login.gtfo2: Unfortunately, we could not verify your status.
